ctx: intros d s c tl l e l0 H.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "l" and "tl" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (l1 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list) => forall e0 : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l1, u_conv_lr_0_r d0 l1 tl0 l0 -> u_conv_str_0_r d0 s (app c tl0) (rec_st d0 s c tl0 l1 e0 l0) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "u_conv_lr_0_r" of type "forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl0 t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "l1" : "prec_list" "tl0" : "term_list" "l0" : "liste_reconnait d l tl" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d l tl" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 l1 tl0".

original: intros d s c tl l e l0 H. induction l0. - intros. apply u_conv_str_0_r with (l:=l) (e:=e) (l0:=rec_empty d). auto. - intros. apply u_conv0_1 in p. apply IHl0 in H. apply u_conv0_3 in r. apply u_conv0_4 in l1. apply semantic_equiv_1_1 with (l0:=rec_consi d s c tl l e l1) in H. apply semantic_equiv_1_3 with (l0:=rec_consi d s c tl l e l1) in r. apply (semantic_equiv_1_4 d s c tl l l1) in H. apply (semantic_equiv_1_4 d s c tl l l1) in r. auto.
